You can find how-to-solder videos on YouTube, etc.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eIt’s just soldering, but this isn’t the easiest task for learning how to solder.  You can get these with wires already soldered, but costs and shipping time might make that a bad option for you.  If you can find someone local who has the tools and skills, that could be very helpful.
